name: lit-portfolio
description: A Lit-powered portfolio on GitHub Pages

scripts.build: rimraf docs && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --outfile=docs/bundle.js --format=esm && copyfiles -u 1 public/**/* docs && copyfiles -f src/index.html docs && copyfiles -u 1 data/**/* docs/data && copyfiles -u 1 assets/**/* docs/assets && replace-in-file "./index.ts" "./bundle.js" docs/index.html
